Product:{\"sku\":\"7100096604\"}.name: ESCAPE BACKROOMS: DARKNESS HORROR

features.label: Recomenzar de cero tras las derrotas

Product:{\"sku\":\"7100096604\"}.description({\"html\":true}):
Welcome to a harrowing survival horror experience where the ordinary becomes a waking nightmare.
You find yourself trapped in an endless, abandoned parking garage. Dim lights flicker overhead, concrete levels stretch into darkness, and something moves just out of sight—always watching, always waiting.

Navigate the winding corridors, uncover eerie clues, and solve twisted puzzles to search for a way out. But be warned: the deeper you go, the more reality begins to unravel. Familiar signs and barriers twist into a maze of fear and paranoia.

With haunting sound design, adaptive AI-driven threats, and a suffocating atmosphere, every step could be your last.
Will you escape the garage’s grasp, or become another lost soul echoing through its endless levels?
Product:{\"sku\":\"7100096604\"}.disclaimer:
Se requiere una suscripción a Nintendo Switch Online (se vende por separado) para utilizar la función de guardado de datos en la nube.

©CGI LAB GAMES

Welcome to a harrowing survival horror experience where the ordinary becomes a waking nightmare.
You find yourself trapped in an endless, abandoned parking garage. Dim lights flicker overhead, concrete levels stretch into darkness, and something moves just out of sight—always watching, always waiting.

Navigate the winding corridors, uncover eerie clues, and solve twisted puzzles to search for a way out. But be warned: the deeper you go, the more reality begins to unravel. Familiar signs and barriers twist into a maze of fear and paranoia.

Product:{\"sku\":\"7100096604\"}.headline: Trapped in an endless parking garage. No exits. No light. No escape—only the darkness that follows.
